title: Ready Now.... Tour Today and Get $250 Free Gas Card
posting_body: ['WELCOME TO THE QUINN APARTMENT HOMES', 'Welcome to The Quinn Apartments.', 'Experience quiet and distinctive apartment homes for rent situated within the Paradise Valley, minutes away from the world famous Las Vegas Strip.', 'Comfort and relaxation set the theme for The Quinn Apartments.', "Our lush landscaping and unique architecture provide an atmosphere you won't find anywhere else.", 'Visit our photo gallery and call us to schedule a personal tour.', 'Open the door to a new way of life at The Quinn Apartments.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1056 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Newly Renovated Apartment Homes Available*', '- Walk-In Closets', '- In-Kitchen Pantry', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Double Kitchen Sinks', '- Hardwood-Inspired Flooring*', '- Fireplace*', '- Full-Size Washer/Dryer', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Central Air Conditioning & Heating', '- Stainless-Steel Appliances*', '- Two-Toned Upgraded Paint*', '*In select apartment homes only', 'Community Amenities', '- Free Wi-Fi in Common Areas', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- 24-Hour Pool & Spa', '- Community Clubhouse', '- Gated Entry', '- Online Payments Available', '- Fitness Center', 'Pet Policy', 'We are a pet friendly community.', 'Please see one of our leasing specialists for a list of pet deposit, pet fees and monthly pet rent information.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Weight limitations apply.', 'Income Requirements:', '3-times the monthly rent amount.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday 9:00', 'AM-6:00 PM', 'Saturday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM', 'Sunday 10:00 PM-5:00 PM', 'The Quinn', '5500 Mountain Vista Street, Las Vegas, NV, 89120', 'NJGEk92Yj']
